def is_in_fridge(chicken: item):
    # Helper function to check if the chicken is in the fridge
    symbol in_fridge = exists fridge: item: is_fridge(fridge) and inside(chicken, fridge)
    return in_fridge

behavior cut_chicken(chicken: item):
    body:
        achieve cut(chicken)  # Achieve a state where the chicken is cut into pieces

behavior move_to_fridge(chicken: item, fridge: item):
    body:
        achieve inside(chicken, fridge)  # Achieve a state where the chicken is inside the fridge

behavior close_fridge(fridge: item):
    body:
        achieve closed(fridge)  # Achieve a state where the fridge is closed
        
behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind chicken: item where:
            is_food_chicken(chicken)
        # Bind the chicken item
        
        bind fridge: item where:
            is_fridge(fridge)
        # Bind the fridge
        
        cut_chicken(chicken)
        
        if not is_in_fridge(chicken):
            move_to_fridge(chicken, fridge)
            close_fridge(fridge)

Question: Can you tell me how to cut the chicken into pieces, then put it back in the fridge.

behavior put_back_chicken_piece(piece:item, fridge:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(piece, fridge)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind chicken: item where:
            is_food_chicken(chicken)
        # Ensure the chicken is cut into pieces
        achieve cut(chicken)
        
        bind fridge: item where:
            is_fridge(fridge)
            
        foreach piece: item:
            if is_food_chicken(piece) and cut(piece):
                put_back_chicken_piece(piece, fridge)
        # Ensure the fridge is closed after placing the chicken inside
        achieve closed(fridge)

def is_cuttable_chicken(chicken:item):
    # Determine if the item is cuttable and is chicken
    symbol cuttable_chicken=is_food_chicken(chicken) and cuttable(chicken)
    return cuttable_chicken

behavior cut_chicken(chicken:item):
    body:
        achieve cut(chicken)

behavior store_in_fridge(item:item, fridge:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(item, fridge)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind fridge: item where:
            is_fridge(fridge)
        # Select a fridge
        bind chicken: item where:
            is_food_chicken(chicken)
        # Select chicken as the item
        
        if is_cuttable_chicken(chicken):
            # If the chicken is cuttable, proceed to cut it
            cut_chicken(chicken)
        
        store_in_fridge(chicken, fridge)
